actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two Scythe or Soul Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Scythe
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8 damage) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10 damage) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Soul Bolt
entries: Ranged Spell atk +8 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 26 (4d10 + 4 damage) necrotic damage. If the target has the {@condition frightened} condition, the giant gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.
